article:
A man who loved to hunt bought two fine setters that he later trained to be fine bird dogs. He kept them in a large,fenced pen in his backyard.
One morning he41 _ a little bulldog coming down the path behind his home.It saw the tow dogs and squeezed under the  _  .The man thought he should perhaps lock up the setters so they wouldn't  _  the little lovely dog.But then he changed his mind.Maybe they would teach that bulldog a lesson,he said to himself.
As he predicted,  _  began to fly,and all of it was the bulldog's fur. The intruder soon had  _  and squeezed back under the fence to get away.
To the man's  _  the visitor returned again the next morning. And like the day before,it soon  _  and squeezed out of the pen and get away.
The incident was   _  , the following day, with the same result.
The man left home early the next morning on a business trip and  _  after several weeks, He asked his wife what finally  _  to the bulldog.
"You won't  _  it."She replied,"At the same time every day that little dog came to the backyard and  _  with our setters and with the same ending, it got away.It  _  missed a day!It has come to the  _  now that when our setters simply   _  it snorting down the path,they start whining and run down into the basement.  _  the little bulldog struts around our backyard  as if  he owns it."
Dale Carnegie made this  _  :"Most of the   _   things in the world have been  _  by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all."
